topic.title: ¿How can i support Zeronet to have more compatibility with spanish lenguage?
topic.body: Hi, just how the tittle says, i see there are a few things already that are in english, id like to translate everything of the base system that is translatable.

topic.title: Is this normal?
topic.body:
When i open the default Blog i only see this, when i clone it i get the same result, i can't also access Zeroid, it gets stuck in the main logo.

![a](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8495728/27008288-77c256e8-4e3b-11e7-9eac-ae0af93e7348.png)

topic.title: ¿Doc pages, official web page translation?
topic.body:
Hi, i made this es-lt (Spanish Latin America) translation of the official webpage, i don't know where to ask how to contribute for this so i make the question here with an html translated to contribute. 

[ZeroMet_es-lt.zip](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/files/1069489/ZeroMet_es-lt.zip)

Another question is ¿where can i get a file copy of the ZeroNet docs?, i wish to also support the translation of this documents to implement it. Thanks, have a good day.

1604065958_mirrored_kuipumu_github.body:
All the other pages like Zerotalk get stuck at Initial sync progess... i see the posts in ZeroHello but this shows empty, only comment dialog without content.

![sin titulo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8495728/27008374-53545980-4e3d-11e7-823d-a2d3ace56852.png)

![sin titulo2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8495728/27008381-7b70c246-4e3d-11e7-8f16-b1e2cdd07c4d.png)

I see this error in network. the same happens in Edge, the files are updated, the same happens with every other page, y unpacked the app in another folder and the only thing that changed is that the Zeroid page works and the authentication service, also can publish pages, the pages were even unable to publish before that.

![sin titulo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8495728/27015244-90109db2-4ed7-11e7-8525-4f4d33136ecc.jpg)
![sin titulo2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8495728/27015245-9017c380-4ed7-11e7-9cdf-2f92427c8fc6.jpg)
I also tried it before with the blog, didn't worked, i tried now with Talk, Blog, Me, and did not work, There is no temporal file that Zeronet.exe or Tor.exe creates?.

Doesn't work, I had a firewall enabled, i disabled it but still persist, also reset the pc, still, cleaned files with C
Cclenaer, same... I don't know what is happening, the error still persist on all pages.
![sin titulo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8495728/27018439-99146322-4efe-11e7-817e-42526af48c24.png)

This is how my ZeroHello page looks. 
![sin titulo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8495728/27018839-8599cda2-4f01-11e7-95cb-7c2e8ed1cdf0.png)

Again, i send you the one from Gif forum to see if there is data 
[zerotalk.zip](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/files/1076299/zerotalk.zip)
[zeroblog.zip](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/files/1076307/zeroblog.zip)
¡Excellent!, the issue is fixed, thank you, you are awesome, love this project, keep on.
